languages.text: {n}Повисает неловкое молчание.{/n} "Понимаю, Звездное Сиятельство, все эти разговоры и официальные процедуры так утомляют! Но мы как никогда близки к финалу",{n} — нервно улыбается губернатор.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Повисает неловкое молчание. {/n}"Понимаю, Ваше Сиятельство, все эти разговоры и официальные процедуры так утомляют! Но мы как никогда близки к финалу",{n} — нервно улыбается губернатор.{/n}

languages.text: {n}There is an awkward pause. The governor smiles nervously:{/n} "I understand, Your Celestial Highness. All this talking and ceremony and protocol — it's enough to knock anyone off their feet! But believe me when I say that we are nearing the end."
languages.original_text: {n}Повисает неловкое молчание.{/n} "Понимаю, Звездное Сиятельство, все эти разговоры и официальные процедуры так утомляют! Но мы как никогда близки к финалу",{n} — нервно улыбается губернатор.{/n}

{n}There is an awkward pause. The governor smiles nervously:{/n} "I understand, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. All this talking and ceremony and protocol — it's enough to knock anyone off their feet! But believe me when I say that we are nearing the end."

{n}There is an awkward pause. The governor smiles nervously:{/n} "I understand, Your Celestial Highness. All this talking and ceremony and protocol — it's enough to knock anyone off their feet! But believe me when I say that we are nearing the end."

{n}There is an awkward pause. The governor smiles nervously:{/n} "I understand, Your Celestial Highness. All this talking and ceremony and protocol — it's enough to knock anyone off their feet! But believe me when I say that we are nearing the end."

languages.text: {n}尴尬的沉默笼罩在众人身上，总督露出了紧张的微笑。{/n}“我明白您的意思了，来自上界的大人。这些繁冗的谈话、仪式、礼节确实会让人相当吃不消！不过请相信，我们的仪式马上就要结束了。”
languages.original_text: {n}There is an awkward pause. The governor smiles nervously:{/n} "I understand, Your Celestial Highness. All this talking and ceremony and protocol — it's enough to knock anyone off their feet! But believe me when I say that we are nearing the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}尴尬的沉默笼罩在众人身上，总督露出了紧张的微笑。{/n}“我明白您的意思了，来自上界的大人。这些繁冗的谈话、仪式、礼节确实会让人相当吃不消！不过请相信，我们的仪式马上就要结束了。”

languages.text: {n}Se produce un incómodo silencio. El gobernador sonríe azorado:{/n} «Lo entiendo, Excelencia Celestial. ¡Tanto hablar de ceremonia y protocolo basta para dormir al más pintado! Pero créame cuando le digo que nos acercamos al final».
languages.original_text: {n}There is an awkward pause. The governor smiles nervously:{/n} "I understand, Your Celestial Highness. All this talking and ceremony and protocol — it's enough to knock anyone off their feet! But believe me when I say that we are nearing the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se produce un incómodo silencio. El gobernador sonríe azorado:{/n} «Lo entiendo, Excelencia Celestial. ¡Tanto hablar de ceremonia y protocolo basta para dormir al más pintado! Pero créame cuando le digo que nos acercamos al final».

languages.text: {n}Garip bir sessizlik meydana geliyor. Vali gergince gülümsüyor.{/n} "Anlıyorum Semavi Efendimiz. Bütün bu laf cambazlıkları, törenler ve protokoller; insana işkence gibi geliyor! İnanın bana, çok az kaldı."
languages.original_text: {n}There is an awkward pause. The governor smiles nervously:{/n} "I understand, Your Celestial Highness. All this talking and ceremony and protocol — it's enough to knock anyone off their feet! But believe me when I say that we are nearing the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}Garip bir sessizlik meydana geliyor. Vali gergince gülümsüyor.{/n} "Anlıyorum Semavi Efendimiz. Bütün bu laf cambazlıkları, törenler ve protokoller; insana işkence gibi geliyor! İnanın bana, çok az kaldı."

languages.text: {n}気まずい沈黙がある。総督は緊張した様子で微笑む。{/n}「わかりました、天の閣下。こんなに話し続け、式典やプロトコルがあると、誰でも疲れてしまうものです！しかし、私が言うことを信じていただければ、もうすぐ終わりが近いのです」
languages.original_text: {n}There is an awkward pause. The governor smiles nervously:{/n} "I understand, Your Celestial Highness. All this talking and ceremony and protocol — it's enough to knock anyone off their feet! But believe me when I say that we are nearing the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}気まずい沈黙がある。総督は緊張した様子で微笑む。{/n}「わかりました、天の閣下。こんなに話し続け、式典やプロトコルがあると、誰でも疲れてしまうものです！しかし、私が言うことを信じていただければ、もうすぐ終わりが近いのです」

languages.text: {n}Un silence gênant s'installe. Le gouverneur ose un sourire nerveux :{/n} « Je comprends, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Toutes ces discussions, ces cérémonies, ce protocole... Ce serait épuisant pour n'importe qui ! Mais permettez-moi de vous rassurer : nous en avons bientôt fini. »
languages.original_text: {n}There is an awkward pause. The governor smiles nervously:{/n} "I understand, Your Celestial Highness. All this talking and ceremony and protocol — it's enough to knock anyone off their feet! But believe me when I say that we are nearing the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un silence gênant s'installe. Le gouverneur ose un sourire nerveux :{/n} « Je comprends, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Toutes ces discussions, ces cérémonies, ce protocole... Ce serait épuisant pour n'importe qui ! Mais permettez-moi de vous rassurer : nous en avons bientôt fini. »

languages.text: {n}Es entsteht eine unangenehme Pause. Der Gouverneur lächelt nervös:{/n} "Ich verstehe, Eure himmlische Hoheit! All das Gerede und Zeremoniell und Protokoll, das ist für jeden zu viel! Aber glaubt mir, wir nähern uns dem Ende."
languages.original_text: {n}There is an awkward pause. The governor smiles nervously:{/n} "I understand, Your Celestial Highness. All this talking and ceremony and protocol — it's enough to knock anyone off their feet! But believe me when I say that we are nearing the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}Es entsteht eine unangenehme Pause. Der Gouverneur lächelt nervös:{/n} "Ich verstehe, Eure himmlische Hoheit! All das Gerede und Zeremoniell und Protokoll, das ist für jeden zu viel! Aber glaubt mir, wir nähern uns dem Ende."
